title: Darker Than You Think
description: The unsettling dreams begin for small-town reporter Will Barbee not long after he first meets April Bell. They are vivid, powerful and deeply disturbing nightmares in which he commits atrocious acts. And, on by one, his friends are meeting violent deaths. It is clear to Barbee that he is embroiled in something far beyond human understanding, something unspeakably evil. And it intimately involves the seductive, dangerously intoxicating April, and the question, 'Who is the Child of Night?' When he discovers the answer to that, his world will change utterly."The classic werewolf novel" HORROR: THE 100 BEST BOOKS"Yields sheer enjoyment, generating wonder and suspense as Williamson springs his sequence of trapdoors with the efortless agility of a master." Peter Straub
author: Jack Williamson
